data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Botov, Andreas, Phung, Trung My, Nguyen, Truong Quang, Bauer, Aaron M., Brennan, Ian G., Ziegler, Thomas (2015): A new species of Dixonius (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Phu Quy Island, Vietnam. Zootaxa 4040 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4040.1.4
